name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **TypeScript**, **React**, and **React Native** to build seamless cross-platform applications that prioritize user experience in the fintech sector. I integrate modern strategies in **authentication** and **WebAuthn** to ensure secure and compliant solutions, utilizing my knowledge in **clean architecture** and **agile** methodologies to enhance development processes. My background in collaboration and communication allows me to work effectively within cross-functional teams.
Beyond frontend expertise, I possess strong full-stack capabilities with a tech stack that includes **Node.js**, **Python**, and libraries such as **Flutter** and **FastAPI**. I have a solid foundation in cloud solutions with **Azure** and **AWS**, leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms and employing **microservices architecture** and **CI/CD automation** to drive efficiency and quality. My proficiency in integrating AI/ML capabilities into applications further supports intelligent automation and real-time data processing.
